[[Momoshiki]] directs pieces of rubble at a target. By tensing his fingers, Momoshiki can heat the rubble remotely, causing it to cling to targets when it contacts them and inflict severe burns. By clenching his fist, he can make the rubble detonate, creating enough force to break through [[Susanoo]].
